mapper.select: SELECT C.categoryIdx, C.categoryName, C.categoryPrice, C.categoryIcon FROM Category C
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Category(categoryIdx, categoryName, categoryPrice, categoryIcon, categoryIconName) VALUES(#{categoryIdx}, #{categoryName}, #{categoryPrice}, #{categoryIcon}, #{categoryIconName}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE categoryName = #{categoryName}, categoryPrice = #{categoryPrice}, categoryIcon = #{categoryIcon}, categoryIconName = #{categoryIconName}
